name: Deatholopods
description:
This game was made in a short period of time by a group of 5 students. It is broken in its current state, and as such, it's intended purpose is for portfolio and professional demonstration, and not actual play.

The game requires 2 Xinput pads to play.

Credits: Kalin Chambers, Dylan Wright, Brendan Pulis, William Dosen, Aleksia Jankovic.
